kw.name: Construct json body for POST request
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=RVMSession, url=http://216.10.245.166, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://216.10.245.166/Library/Addbook.php path_url=/Library/Addbook.php headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '72', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "RVMbook", "isbn": "rvm1", "aisle": "1234", "author": "aramya"}'

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
